title: Baby Walkers Help Kids Walk Sooner
description: Learn Baby Walkers Help Kids Walk Sooner in one minute.

hook.text: A parent buys a baby walker to help her child learn to walk. It does the opposite.

buildup.text: Baby walkers have been marketed as developmental aids for decades.

discovery.text: Studies found walkers actually delay walking by several weeks â€” they develop the wrong muscles.

twist.text: Canada banned baby walkers entirely in 2004 due to both injury risk and developmental harm.

climax.text: Floor time, crawling, and pulling up on furniture develop walking skills far more effectively.
